"GoodRx's cash prices are based on multiple sources, including published price lists, purchases, claims records, and data provided by pharmacies. Our discount and coupon prices are based on contracts between a pharmacy (or pharmacy purchasing group) and a Pharmacy Benefit Manager (PBM), who provides prices to us."

The prices we show are our best estimate; while we believe our data to be generally accurate, we cannot guarantee that the price we display will exactly match the price you receive at the pharmacy. For an exact price, please contact the pharmacy.
Please keep in mind that the pharmacy will require the information shown on the GoodRx coupon/discount to confirm the discount price.
Add a Photo of Your Prescription

How was your experience using this coupon?

Present the coupon to the pharmacist when filling or refilling your prescription. Once you use a coupon, it will remain on file at your pharmacy and can be used for any medication you fill or refill there.

"Some pharmacists may not be aware that they are contractually obligated to honor GoodRx coupons. Start by calling the phone number on the coupon, and if that doesn't resolve the issue, contact us at "info@goodrx.com.
This discount can be used by any member of your family and will work at other pharmacies, though your price may vary.
This is not insurance. Cannot be used in conjunction with Medicare or Medicaid.
Create a GoodRx account to access your prescription information form the web or other devices. All data is stored securely, and we will never share your email address.

"The GoodRx Fair Price represents an average discount price for the most-prescribed form, dosage and quantity of a specific drug. If you're being charged more, you should use GoodRx to find lower prices."
For prescription to be taken over:
"Please enter your email address and we'll send you further instructions."
Use the Pill Identifier to look up your mystery med by shape, color or imprint (the text printed on the pill or capsule).

Great!"
The more information we can capture, the more useful My Rx will be. If there is more to record on the packaging, let's take another picture.
If that's all there is, tap 'Done'."

GoodRx adheres to quality standards established by a nationally-recognized professional organization that works to ensure the public health and patient safety. As such, GoodRx only displays the names and locations of pharmacies that have been approved by this organization.
However, we can provide you with this coupon that will give you a discounted price at most pharmacies near you, including this one.
"Why doesn't GoodRx show some pharmacy names?"
"There doesn't seem to be any images for this prescription. You can add a photo of your prescription by tapping the button at the bottom."
Sorry, there are currently no images available for this drug.
To recommend the pharmacies with the lowest combined price for all your My Rx prescriptions, GoodRx needs to know where to search.
There are no matches for specified combination of imprint, shape, and color. Try removing one or more of your selections.
There are currently no available Latest News for this drug. We encourage you to check back later.
GoodRx could not find any prices for this format, quantity or dosage. You might try going back and change one or more your search settings.
Tap the magnifying glass in the upper right corner to search current prescription prices.

"Found a pill or capsule and you don't know what it is? Search by the imprint (the text on the pill) or narrow down by the color or shape using the filters above."
PillPack is a full-service online pharmacy that pre-sorts and organizes all your medications by the time of day you take them. They offer:
"%s has been approved by the FDA, but isn't available in pharmacies yet."
Drugs may be approved days, weeks or months before they are launched, so we encourage you to check back.
Would you recommend GoodRx to friends?
"Sorry to hear that. We'd love to get any feedback from you on our app and how we can make it better. The more details you can provide the better. Want to share your experience?"
"We're so happy to hear that you would recommend GoodRx! It'd be really helpful if you rated us. Thanks so much for spending some time with us."

With your new GoodRx account, you can:
Sign in and view your prescriptions at www.goodrx.com
Synchronize your My Rx prescriptions across other devices (iPad, iPhone).
Get price and news alerts via email.
"Find the lowest local prices for your prescriptions"

My Best Pharmacy calculates the lowest combined price for your selected prescriptions at pharmacies in your area, using available discounts or a coupon from GoodRx. It may be possible to pay less by visiting multiple pharmacies, but My Best Pharmacy balances convenience and savings in its recommendations.
